title: I'm bored GD, give me an off-meta build
body:
something actually make sense, not something like AP Vayne.
So far I've tried AD {{champion:90}} , AP{{champion:54}} ,AP{{champion:80}} ,AP{{champion:110}}, AD{{champion:85}} ,FUll AP{{champion:53}}, AD{{champion:84}}, AD{{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} ,AP{{champion:22}} , AD{{champion:60}} ,AP{{champion:51}}  already.
Give me some advice GD, I'm bored of serious games.
